website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy, stylish construction that comes in multiple colors and design options
pros: Available in espresso, honey, white, and black
Six stackable storage units that measure 15 inches by 15 inches each
Made with a combination of solid wood and PVC laminate
Holds up to 200 pounds in total
cons: This is the most expensive item on our list

customer_reviews.title: Love my shelves!!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, my shelves! I mounted them on a wall in my office using 2 X 4s with the help of a couple of friends. Instead of using the pull out drawers, I replaced it with another cabinet unit with a swinging door. That order was from another site that sold the cabinets as individual units. My office mate purchased 6 units as well, and together they look like one large unit. I would highly recommend this product. We receive lots of compliments! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Great storage cabinets.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I bought two and have them four wide and three high for storage in my kitchen. They fit together in any configuration. Just turn the cabinet over for the door to open on the left.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: They are surprisingly good quality for processed wood
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these units for our house so far. One to use as a modular dresser and the other as an entryway cabinet. They are surprisingly good quality for processed wood, and I had no difficulties assembling each piece by myself. Once you have all the pieces together and configured in the layout you want, they are easy to attach to one another, don't wobble, shift around, or otherwise seems structurally deficient.
customer_reviews.author: fuhtian

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!! EASY to put together
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!! EASY to put together, all parts are precision made. I cant understand why all the negative reviews. It is not rickety at all. maybe they should have got a DIY guy to put it together for them. As far as "sliding about", what is wrong with putting a couple of small pieces of double sided sticky pads between the sections?? It did the trick for me, without using the little brackets supplied. I bought the Honey color.....beautiful finish
customer_reviews.author: Brialtous

customer_reviews.title: You can arrange the cubes almost any way you like!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Durable. Very versatile! You get 5 pieces. One single door cube, one double drawer cube, one double shelf cube, one single cube, and two connected single cubes. You can leave any or all them all open for 6 single cubes if you want. They all stack (except the double cube). I got two sets for more arrangement options. I'm even considering some add-on pieces. The quality is great. Good color. Nice screw hole covers. I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Romandy

customer_reviews.title: Versatile  Printer Stand
customer_reviews.text: This came well packaged and was easy to put together. Some of the dowel holes were too deep but that was easy to overcome with glue. It is a perfect printer stand and holds most of the printing accessories fit in the spaces available. I have ordered two more two cubbie units to add to it to fill the spaces left in the area that I was trying to fill. It looks great and is sturdy. I will order more as I organize by crafting area.
customer_reviews.author: Ocie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I Expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous purchasing this but it turned out to be amazing! Sad to find i cannot purchase this anymore and that the price has gone up but it is great. It wasn't damaged when i received this. It was easy to build. I love that I can always switch up how i want it look and it looks very presentable!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful. However they move around alot and I have a 17mth old so it's not safe. It's been about 2wks now and there's no solution. I wish it came with something to hold them in place once stacked. That's my reason for 1 stars.
customer_reviews.author: #LIFEWITHTHEGILLYS

customer_reviews.title: ... both had large cracks in them from what looks like someone stepping on them in the center
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and a piece from both had large cracks in them from what looks like someone stepping on them in the center. So that was disappointing. They also show finger prints really easily. I will say however that once put together they seem pretty sturdy. The assembly process is a huge pain, it will literally take you hours so set aside an afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great
customer_reviews.text: These are light weight modular shelves with a hollow core. They are good for storage on a budget, but they will not stand the test of time. It is easy to damage the finish and even break the shelves because of the thin walls. Our application was in a closet that had too little storage. We assembled these in the center as "island" storage using back to back units. Works OK, until we can get something more permanent fabricated. Assembly is not complicated, just tedious.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this system to organize my closet, it is great! Very functional holding my laundry supplies, tools and even clothing. The separate compartments make it great for holding lots of different things. I use the drawers to hold all my camis and tanks (file syle) and the divided cubes are great for holding jeans and skirts in short stacks. The appearance is a little cheap (unfinished edges and some are slightly not lined up 100%) but for this price on modular storage it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great storage unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great storage system. Very light and can be arranged in any formation. I loved it so much, that I added an additional piece. It was very easy to assemble and took no time at all. I used an electric drill to make light work of it. It is made of compressed wood so don't purchase if you are excepting solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: Nielle56

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged so I could not put the entire unit together. Very disappointed in the shipping packaging. For what this costs it shouldn’t be damaged in shipping. The rest of the shelf seems fine and I’m happy with it, but considering the two shelves that broke are $21 each I’m not happy
customer_reviews.author: Shawna heart Legg

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with quality and sturdiness for the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made sturdy organizational unit. It was not hard to put together and all my pieces came well packaged and undamaged. Very impressed of the quality for the price I paid. Will definitely be purchasing more in the future if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin P

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to create storage for my crafting storage. My hubby said these were super easy to put together. They also look good. Yes, they are made out of pressed board and laminate veneer .. but, so far so good. I'll probably be ordering another set or individual parts to fill in some empty spaces. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: I love this set!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! I had previously purchased a couple of cube units made by Recollections and intended to build something like this gradually with those. I came across this set which was a much better deal for the money so and decided to give it a try and so glad I did! The Foremost cubes are much higher quality and look much nicer than the Recollections brand sold in craft stores. They are light weight yet sturdy. I was so happy with them that I just bought two of the file drawer cubes to complete my set and ended up giving away the Recollections cubes because they look cheap next to these.
customer_reviews.author: TMC

customer_reviews.title: looks Ok, but quality is very poor.  some parts were damaged from shipping
customer_reviews.text: the cabinets looks fine, but the quality is very poor. The panels are hallow and thin. A few of the panel were damage just from shipping. And when you assemble the pieces together, you need to use some force, especially when putting in the draw rollers. The force it takes to put the rollers in is enough to damage the panel. I didn't return it because it's so heavy and bulky. Just kept it with the damage, dented panels.
customer_reviews.author: May Lam

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Just took a little time and some muscle (in my hands). Set up for my grandson's toys and it's the perfect size for a toddler. It didn't take him long tho' to figure out how to climb on top of it!!! The laminate is nice, no chipping. Lightweight pieces. Was a little worried after reading some of the reviews that said it was difficult to get the drawers in properly, but was fortunate and had no problems. Would recommend. Feel the price tag could come down a little.
customer_reviews.author: J Christine

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and Difficult
customer_reviews.text: The modular aspect of this piece is going to be great if/when I can replace the single open cube that was damaged. There were no shipping problems and I hope to be able to only have to replace the one piece instead of having to deconstruct and send back the entire thing. It was difficult enough to put together the few pieces that are assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office. I was attracted to the price and look of the modular pieces. It’s inexpensive, and in a way looks kinda nd of cheap, and isn’t as sturdy as I would have liked. It’s a nice buy for someone on a tight budget that needs storage in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Walters

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: bought to organize our closet, went together pretty well. it has survived a move and multiple changes.
customer_reviews.author: bking

customer_reviews.title: Overall good buy and Good Quality Unit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality system. Yes the wood is basically an engineered (pressed) type of wood but unlike most furniture of this type I have purchased I did not notice too many (I did not say any) issues with splitting or cracking. The hardware is positioned to help make the units very strong as well. The drawer unit is very small. If anyone reads reviews about the longer split/shelf units they are correct, these units are the correct size for strength. Overall a really good value and quality system when compared to what you see at Target or Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Price

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I find this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a desk upgrade with more storage space, and this was a flexible option of the perfect height, with more storage space than I know what to do with! I will be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: tlking4

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive than Ikea but for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Putting the screws on the back to keep the boxes together made the boards split. 'solid wood' my left cheek. Great looking shelf though once I put metal handles on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: ALOT of storage space cant go wrong on these
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice for a walk in closet. I got 2 of these. They offer A LOT of storage. You definitely can't go wrong on these. I had 2 of these put together and in place in under an hour that's how easy they are to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Moss

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as promised!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the other people got but I got a box full of beautifully crafted pieces, lightweight as promised. Everything included, no chipped pieces. It was incredibly easy to put together and it suits my purpose to a T. It was exactly what I wanted and I couldn't be happier with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, I already want to buy more.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite piece I've bought so far, very easy to assemble. The texture of these are also very nice to the touch and it's fun knowing you can change this around whenever you want.
customer_reviews.author: Ἀνάγκη

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice for organizing, don't put heavy weight ontop in the center
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Closet System
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the closet system. Actually ordered more to fill up the available space.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer strumwasser

customer_reviews.title: Love this storage system.
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily with many options on how to stack together. Seem durable and should last many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Playroom Organization Bliss
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our playroom. We went from old laundry baskets full of toys to this modular system that can be setup in a myriad of combinations. We purchased some small baskets that perfectly fit the large open cubes. The playroom is now orgainzed! It was easy to setup and configure. Pieces are lighter-weight than anticipated. We would purchase again and recommend it to others looking to organize a playroom or even a child or teenager's bedroom. (System is nice but not vey vancy for a master bedroom or family room.)
customer_reviews.author: jml

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay together well but fine for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great system because you can build on it and arrange it any way that you like. My only issue was that after spending the couple of hours it took to put each individual piece together, I was disappointed at the cheap brackets meant to hold it together to act as one piece. We needed to create another way to keep the pieces from sliding around. It serves its purpose and I'm glad I purchased it but thought it was worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and very useful
customer_reviews.text: Great selection of configurations/styles (i.e. with door, draws, divided cube, and open cube) providing many options WRT how to use these. I have a set in a child's room and it helps to organize the storage needs for clothing, toys, puzzles and videos.
customer_reviews.author: MHC1

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for my crafting space.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of assembly required. Would suggest it as a 2 person job, but I put everything together by myself, and it's definitely manageable. The outer packaging was damaged, but inside packaging and all pieces of the unit were intact with no damage. The unit works really well in my craft room. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I like how you can design it how you need it. is cheap particle board
customer_reviews.author: Tator

customer_reviews.title: I liked it. It took me a bit to assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: Life size tetris! I liked it. It took me a bit to assemble it then I figured the configuration I wanted. After the first couple of cubes I got on a roll. It looks great and it fit perfectly at on end of my narrow deep closet.
customer_reviews.author: Minerva Correa

customer_reviews.title: I love my closet
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, excellent instructions and easy assembly ~and cheaper than other brands that are not rated well for assembly. I designed a great closet storage system!! Love these! Bought 2
customer_reviews.author: Church

customer_reviews.title: Great for Organizing a Kid's Room
customer_reviews.text: These were kind of a pain to assemble (easy just super time consuming!!) but once they were finished, it was worth it! My son's room looks so much more organized now and they matched the other shelf I already had for the rest of his Legos. I also bought an additional shelf (the large open shelf) for extra Lego space (basically what I'm saying is this boy has too many Legos). This is durable material, all of the fixtures fit securely, and the drawers slide easily. No complaints, here!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very useful.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this unit, and plan on adding more pieces. Written as well as diagrammed instructions, and once first part was built, the rest were a snap. Pieces were clearly marked with little stickers to facilitate identifying correct pieces. Cubes are sturdy, and it is easy to arrange in different patterns to suit your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt but again
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than seems. Even after reading dimensions. Had extra pieces, mislabeled pieces. Damaged pieces. Thin and cheap
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for storing.
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty decent and easy to put together. They aren't that strong so don't put anything too heavy on them. Very good for storing books or clothes.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and really configurable
customer_reviews.text: Just recently moved to a new apartment and this set has proved to be a great flexible solution that is easy to adjust to the evolution of how my apartment is setup.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Berberian

customer_reviews.title: Very satified.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this piece. Easy to put together. I had one issue with one of the handles being damaged however it was easy to contact the company and a replacement was sent out immediately. Excellent service! I only rated it a 4 instead of a 5 because I consider 5 to be near perfect and it is rare that something is so near perfect. Ideally, I would give this piece a 4.5.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wahlne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install if you replace the original wooden dowels ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install if you replace the original wooden dowels with Madison Mill 1/4" x 1 1/4" Dowel Pins (from Lowe's for example. Buy 3 boxes for the pictured furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Olaf

customer_reviews.title: Did its job
customer_reviews.text: Great little inexpensive cube unit. I purchased two of these to organize a bunch of music and computer-related items in my office. Pros: Very easy to assemble Looks nice The cabinets and drawers are great The cube are roomy and hold a variety of items Cubes can be stacked in any configuration you can think of Cons: Cubes don't quite line up perfectly You have to be careful when putting together I got a regular cube instead of a drawer cube in the second set that I bought Overall, I'm happy with this purchase. It's an great solution for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and with arrangement options, this is a great storage solution.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry D. Browne

customer_reviews.title: Good extra storage for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The door section didn't fit the rest of the unit so I have them separated. They have given me extra storage w/minimum space.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K.

customer_reviews.title: Three stars.
customer_reviews.text: Corners came chipped. Very easy to assemble. When stacked, boxes do not lay flat; leaves gaps between them. Works in our closet, hidden, but would not leave out in room in view.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Cashman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This item is sturdy and can stack in many different ways. Had to hire someone to assemble it though, as you would need power tools to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Shekinah Garner

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the versatility
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the versatility! It holds EVERYTHING! I was worried putting it together that each unit was going to be too small, but it was perfect! The drawers have enough depth and width. As a crafter I am able to see the things I need and hide what I don't ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't so bad that I would send it back
customer_reviews.text: Came with a few smudges and one crack. It wasn't so bad that I would send it back... When I assembled it, I couldn't see the crack and it didn't make the piece weaker. I like it a lot and easy to put together, just time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B.

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive this unit as pictured. Instead I received a double shelf shoe unit, a small shelf unit, door unit, and an open cub. It does not make the 6 unit shelving as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, great quality, and everything I expected. Perfect addition for more storage space in my home. I love this item...best feature is the individual squares are changeable. Love that feature and have it set the way we want it :-)
customer_reviews.author: JaiMee K. Banks

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it was done during manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: the only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it is damaged. Smears of glue and cracks in finishes. Looks like it was done during manufacturing. Otherwise it is nice looking and fairly easy to assemble. I like that you can move the pieces around to suit your own needs.
customer_reviews.author: crafty

customer_reviews.title: worked out better than expected
customer_reviews.text: worked out better than expected, easy to assemble, could maybe use a couple extra support brackets, but now that I'm not moving it around its good and stable. just need to get a couple more cubes to hold the remainder of my albums
customer_reviews.author: michael hughes

customer_reviews.title: Adaptable cubes
customer_reviews.text: Since all but one unit is separate from the others it offers many ways to configure these cubes which makes it very adaptable to individual needs. The cubes are solid and easy to put together although it does take a little time. I have mine stacked 3 cubes high so that it fits into the space I have. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: V. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Was what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Most of the cubes where easy to put together, but the one with the door, the left side came damaged, because of that it was warped and the door will not close. Good instructions, and it's easy to move around. And if the door worked I would have given it 4 stars, but the last one frustrated me. Too hard to send back since I already had the rest of it put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: I ordered white, but had a black unit arrive ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered white, but had a black unit arrive. Kept it anyway because I couldn't be bothered returning it. Can be configured various ways. What you would expect for what it costs.
customer_reviews.author: WTF1361

customer_reviews.title: Items sent as described, and are durable and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We like the mobility of the cubes, and they are easy to assemble. We used them to mainly let our cats to play and to stay in, plus to display some books. Cubes are stable, and they are displayed beautifully in our study room/cat's play room.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: Superb and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is so much better than I thought it was gonna be. The box looked like it seen it's better days but no scratches no problems all the pieces there and super easy to assemble. This is a great buy I might buy more. I'm in love thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Roman

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like what is shown in the photos
customer_reviews.text: Simple to assemble. Nothing was missing. Looks just like what is shown in the photos.It looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Sensible Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these units for extra storage in our closet. Easy to put together, and I'm not handy whatsoever. Love the look of each cube being a little different.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Fits our need.
customer_reviews.text: Love the cubes. They are sturdy. Fit together nicely. Like the flexibility of arrangement. Am thinking of ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Lesleigh Federinic

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the units
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the units. I purchased the variety set and it looks nice together. The drawers are small and you can't fit much. It would be nice if they offered a little larger dimension for each cube.
customer_reviews.author: ladena

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine for what we
customer_reviews.text: We got two for the closet in the spare bedroom/office. It was simple but time consuming to assemble. I didn't use all the stabilizing screws on the backs and that may be why it is slightly wobbly. Works just fine for what we needed
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Moorpark

customer_reviews.title: Foremost modular 5-in-1 shelf cube storage system, white
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my son keep his toys more organized and I am super super happy with it! Easy to put together, sturdy, but not too expensive (since we all know 5 year old boys are a bit destructive haha!). I would recommend it to a friend, or I would purchase another if I found more uses for the unit!
customer_reviews.author: imjustkelsey

customer_reviews.title: Average at best
customer_reviews.text: Quality is average at best, but what do you expect at the price point. You can't expect high end furniture quality at clearance sale prices. Every piece has some sort of flaw but some are worse than others. The instructions are adequate if you are reasonably mechanically inclined. You definitely get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: but the instructions were easy to follow and it's a solid set
customer_reviews.text: It took some patience to put them all together, but the instructions were easy to follow and it's a solid set. It works great for extra storage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was perfect for my laundry room
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect for my laundry room. WOW! Did not expect it to look so good. The best part was that I can stack them however I wanted. Cannot beat that.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Forde

customer_reviews.title: Super Storage Unit
customer_reviews.text: Love all the storage options in this modular piece. Drawers and doors hide stuff you don't want to look at. Love the versatility of many ways to arrange it. Very sturdy and good looking, too.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: The pieces were in better condition than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The pieces were in better condition than I was expecting. No damage or shipping issues, there was materiel in between pieces to prevent scratching. Put together, it looks very nice and sturdy. The only thing I don't like are the "brackets" that hold each module together. It doesn't do much, I'll just DIY a sturdier fix but until then, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Love love these
customer_reviews.text: So great I bought another one and other modular pieces that go with it. I definately recommend this. They are strong. They look nice and you can rearrange them again and again. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic mama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy construction. Took me quite awhile to assembly, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall I am satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am satisfied with the product. The quality is low, but you get what you paid for. These shelves are perfect for my children and fits their needs. The shelves did arrive in very poor condition. The box came battered and pieces, only one cub was severely damaged. A few had scratches and little dents.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Modular units give a variety of storage options.
customer_reviews.text: I got a million of these storage units for wife's knitting and sewing stash. They go together easily and give you a lot of options for configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Markazon Prime

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 one in black one in espresso. Finish on espresso seems better quality and more durable. Black finished unit had several scratches and a bit of peeling right out of the boxes. Looking ks okay put together and I like the versatility of the units.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMom3

customer_reviews.title: This would be a five star review if the drawer ...
customer_reviews.text: This would be a five star review if the drawer wasn't damaged and I was able to contact someone to replace the drawer only.
customer_reviews.author: Leaha

customer_reviews.title: very poor
customer_reviews.text: poor quality material and the surface is not smooth. I thought it would be nice since it looked so customizable, but I would've been better off buying something from Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great deal but arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: For what you pay it’s a great little set up. Obviously, not the highest quality but still looks good and gives you options for shape and size. Did arrive banged up.
customer_reviews.author: chandlerdboyce

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to build, small enough to fit just about anywhere. And sturdy enough to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Usilton

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: It fit in my closet and was very easy to assemble. It's a bit smaller than I thought it would be, but I am very happy with it. I am considering getting another set of these for another closet.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysette

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Function & looks good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great system. Easy to put together & looks good in our kids playroom. Lots of storage space & the fact that you can construct it any way you want is a huge plus. Only negative is that the drawers don't have stoppers to keep them from pulling out all the way.
customer_reviews.author: BLHoleman

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Whoever engineered this cabinet set, from the easy to put together design, to the brilliant packaging, deserves a medal. This was the easiest thing I've ever put together. Thank you for that! I'm using it for a laundry room and it's just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M.

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend this storage system!
customer_reviews.text: The storage system came packed very well and all pieces were included. The parts of the shelving were clearly labeled and the instructions were easy to follow. I assembled this storage by myself and had it completed in an hour and a half. A screw driver was the only tool needed. The shelves are sturdy and spacious. I would definately recommend this storage system!
customer_reviews.author: WH1984

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and a great furniture piece for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and a great furniture piece for the price. We love the modularity of it and how we can arrange it in any way we choose to.
customer_reviews.author: Suszie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome closet storage for my child
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Much better quality than any IKEA product and a lot easier to assemble Biggest knock was the grammar mistakes in the directions

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Very functional and easily assembled.
customer_reviews.author: katwynne

customer_reviews.title: Storage Unit works well for storage.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. I am 55 and I put it together myself. There are many ways to arrange the storage cubes. The drawers are nice, but you don't have to use any cubes as drawers if you choose. I use the cubes for storing cosmetic, yarn, and the drawers are perfect for socks.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Dillman

customer_reviews.title: Laminated MDF. Use Glue Let Dry. Use these for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: great set went together perfectly and they all stack together. Use gorilla glue its best when working with the laminated mdf and wooden dowels and such!

customer_reviews.title: For the price the designs was great, easy to put together and the ability to ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price the designs was great, easy to put together and the ability to reconfigure it to fit the space was great. Material is light weight but seems sturdy. This is great VALUE and highly recommended for closets/kids rooms. Bought the Bookshelves to but haven't put them together yet.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best storage system ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best storage system ever! They can be arranged however you want and is very durable. I use it for my art studio and it holds so much stuff, I have room left over. Highly recommend this.

product_meta.title: Foremost 340022 Modular 6-in-1 Shelf Cube Storage System, White
product_meta.description:
Color:White

This modular PVC laminate veneer white five in one modular storage cube system includes 15-inch open cube, 15-inch two-drawer cube, 15-inch door cube, 15-inch shelf cube and 30-inch divided cube. Perfect solution to organize your home office or any other room in your house.

Overall size: 
• Open cube 15-inch W x 15-inch D x 15-inch H 
• Two-drawer cube 15-inch W x 15-inch D x 15-inch H 
• Door cube 15-inch W x 15-inch D x 15-inch H 
• Shelf cube 15-inch W x 15-inch D x 15-inch H 
• Divided cube 30-inch W x 15-inch D x 15-inch H

Frame is made out of solid wood, each panel finished with PVC laminate. Sturdy and stackable for maximum durability. Holds up to 200 pounds per assembled unit. Hollow-core construction makes the cube weigh 50% less than traditional particle board. Packed pre-finished, easy assembly and installation. Unlimited combination options so you can create exactly the system you need.
feature_bullets: Frame is made of solid wood making the cube sturdy for maximum durability
Each panel is finished with PVC laminate
Hollowcore construction makes the cube weigh 50% less then traditional particle board
Unlimited combination options so you can create exactly the system you need
Customize-able modular storage great for closet organization, offices, craft rooms and entertainment centers
Easy and versatile assembly and installation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars613 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: We warrant our modular cube storage system to be free from manufacturing defects material and labor to the original purchaser for period listed below. If replacement is necessary, we do reserve the right to replace your furniture with similar product if your item has been discontinued from our line. This warranty is valid only in the continental united states. You will need your dated sales receipt to initiate your warranty claim; it will also be helpful to have your delivery ticket, as the warranty period begins at the time you receive the product in your home. This warranty does not cover damage such as that caused by abuse, misuse, ordinary wear, failure to follow directions, accidents of any type or improper maintenance. This product is covered under 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects in both material and labor. We offer replacement parts for all our modular storage products. Call toll free customer assistance 1-800-443-1410, m - f 8:30 a. M. - 4:30 p. M. Est e-mail address: customerservice@foremostgroups. Com.
